Box.source:
Basic

```html
	<Box margin="10px 0 15px " padding="0 40px">
		<Button primary>Button in Box</Button>
	</Box>
```

Breadcrumb.source:
Basic

```html
<Breadcrumb>
	<BreadcrumbItem href="#!Home">
		<Icon></Icon>
		Home
	</BreadcrumbItem>

	<BreadcrumbItem href="#!Category">
		<Icon></Icon>
		Category
	</BreadcrumbItem>

	<BreadcrumbItem>
		Page
	</BreadcrumbItem>
</Breadcrumb>
```

Button.source:
Event

```html
<Button on-click="{ v = Math.random() }">Random</Button>
<Input value="{ v }"></Input>
```

Checkbox.source:
Event ```html Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Checked：{ ( v && v.length > 0 ) ? v : 'none' } ```

code.html:
Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Checked：{ ( v && v.length > 0 ) ? v : 'none' }

Countdown.source:
Format

```html
<Countdown
	end="{ Date.now() + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 }"
	format="[D] or [DAY] 天 [H] or [HOUR] 时 [M] or [MINUTE] 分 [S] or [SECOND] 秒"
></Countdown>
```

code.html:
<Countdown
    end="{ Date.now() + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 }"
    format="[D] or [DAY] 天 [H] or [HOUR] 时 [M] or [MINUTE] 分 [S] or [SECOND] 秒"
></Countdown>

Countdown.source:
Event ```html {#if !isTimeEnd} {#else} {/if}

isTimeEnd: { isTimeEnd ? 'true' : 'false' }

```

code.html: Selected: { JSON.stringify( selected ) }

Form.source: ### Pure provides two common form layout

Horizontal

```html
<Form>
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
	
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Button primary>Register</Button>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
</Form>
```

code.html:
<Form>
    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Button primary>Register</Button>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>
</Form>

Form.source:
Vertical

```html
<Form v>
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Button primary>Register</Button>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
</Form>
```

code.html:
<Form v>
    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Button primary>Register</Button>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>
</Form>

Input.source:
Error Status With Error Message

```html
<Input error="{ true }" errorMessage="This field is REQUIRED"></Input>
```

code.html: <Input error="{ true }" errorMessage="This field is REQUIRED"></Input>

Modal.source:

{/if} ```
Modal.html:
Basic

{#if showModal}

Pagination.source:
Basic

```html
<Pagination
	min="{ 50 }"
	max="{ 100 }"
	current="{ current || 50 }"
	prevText="<"
	nextText=">"
	on-change="{ current = $event }"
></Pagination>
Current: { current || 50 }
```

code.html:
<Pagination
    min="{ 50 }"
    max="{ 100 }"
    current="{ current || 50 }"
    prevText="<"
    nextText=">"
    on-change="{ current = $event }"
></Pagination>
Current: { current || 50 }

Select.source:
Transparent

```html
<Select value="1" transparent>
	<Option value="0">Option 0</Option>
	<Option value="1">Option 1</Option>
	<Option value="2">Option 2</Option>
</Select>
```

Table.html: Having some event to handle? use raw TR and TD instead

code.html:
{#list dataSource as ds} {/list}
{ ds.name } { ds.email }

Tabs.source:
Basic

```html
<Tabs selected="1">
	<TabPane title="first">
		Content in first tab
	</TabPane>
	<TabPane title="second">
		Content in second tab
	</TabPane>
</Tabs>
```

code.html:
<Tabs selected="1">
    <TabPane title="first">
        Content in first tab
    </TabPane>
    <TabPane title="second">
        Content in second tab
    </TabPane>
</Tabs>

Tabs.source:
Use key

```html
<Tabs selected="key1">
	<TabPane key="key0" title="first">
		Content in first tab
	</TabPane>
	<TabPane key="key1" title="second">
		Content in second tab
	</TabPane>
</Tabs>
```

code.html:
<Tabs selected="key1">
    <TabPane key="key0" title="first">
        Content in first tab
    </TabPane>
    <TabPane key="key1" title="second">
        Content in second tab
    </TabPane>
</Tabs>

<Tabs selected="first" on-change="{ this.onChange( $event ) }">
    <TabPane key="first" title="first">
        Content in first tab
    </TabPane>
    <TabPane key="second" title="second">
        Content in second tab
    </TabPane>
</Tabs>

selected: { currentTabKey || 'first' }

Textarea.source:
Autosize

use `auto`, `autosize` or `autoresize` property to make Textarea adjust height automatically to fit its content

```html
<Textarea value="some content..." auto></Textarea>
```
Textarea.html:
Autosize

use auto, autosize or autoresize property to make Textarea adjust height automatically to fit its content
